ThingDef.label: mech monosword
ThingDef.description: An advanced monosword variant created by the vile mech hive. Unlike the regular mono sword, the mech mono sword is sharper which is capable in penetrating even the finest set of power armor, incredibly durable, and immune to rusting.

ThingDef.label: mech paladin cross
ThingDef.description: An advanced great sword wielded by the mech paladins. The greatsword's edges are completely sharpless and can only deal blunt damage at best, but the paladin cross possess the highest blunt-based damage capable of crushing armor.

ThingDef.label: mech battle axe
ThingDef.description: A dual edge battle axe made with the same material used for the mech mono sword, which is wielded mostly by the mech paladins.

ThingDef.label: mech oodachi
ThingDef.description: A great katana created by the vile mech hive. At the hands of an artificial expert, the oodachi is capable of performing various slashes which deals various damages, some of which can instantly kill the enemy in a single slash. The oodachi is twice the size of the original, and only the beings with mechanical hands are capable of wielding such a weapon.

ThingDef.label: mech lance
ThingDef.description: A gigantic lance wielded by a valkyrian. The mech lance possess the highest armor penetration capable of piercing even the strongest mech variant armor plating, and can inflict a deadly amount of piercing damage in a single hit.

ThingDef.label: mech storm lance
ThingDef.description: A gigantic lance wielded solely by mjolnir. The storm lance has a slightly higher armor penetration than the mech lance, and can call upon a barrage of thunder that can decimate groups of enemies.

ThingDef.label: mech storm lance
ThingDef.description: A gigantic lance wielded solely by mjolnir. The storm lance has a slightly higher armor penetration than the mech lance, which deals a deadly amount of piercing damage against the enemy.

ThingDef.label: charged cannon
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid heavy weapon that fires an explosive payload that explodes in pure energy, which deals deadly amounts of sharp damage under a 2.9 explosion radius.

ThingDef.label: mech chaingun
ThingDef.description: A powerful chaingun designed for crowd control and suppression. This heavy weapon possess the best armor penetration and inflict both extra bleeding and extra pain against enemies upon impact.

ThingDef.label: mech plague chaingun
ThingDef.description: A terrible heavy chemical weapon wielded exclusively by the mech pestilence. The bullet itself can inflict a plague disease with an added bonus of having their immune system jacked and explode upon death.

ThingDef.label: mech stub chaingun
ThingDef.description: An alter version of the mech chaingun that deals more damage and inflict shock pain, in exchange of reduced range, reduced armor penetration, and reduced barrel length.

ThingDef.label: mech laser blaster
ThingDef.description: Rapid fire laser blaster with the highest base damage for an automatic energy weapon. Like a chaingun, it can unleash a storm of high power laser projectiles that can take down any threats with excellent efficientcy. Such a weapon is only seen being wielded by heavy-class mechanoids with abundant energy supply stored within them.

ThingDef.label: tri-shot charge lance
ThingDef.description: An advanced version of the traditional charge lance that fires three consecutive charge rods, dealing triple the damage than usual.

ThingDef.label: charged sniper
ThingDef.description: A charge lance modified with an arc injector, which propels charge projectiles at incredible range and deals heavy amounts of damage on a single target. .

ThingDef.label: assault charge rifle
ThingDef.description: An automatic charge rifle wielded primarily by agile mechanoids. It deals decent damage, better armor penetration, and inflicts vitality drain hediff upon impact.

ThingDef.label: psychic range finder
ThingDef.description: A bizarre weapon capable of inducing a localized psychic explosion at a very long distance that deals severe burns against unsuspecting victims.

ThingDef.label: heavy charge lance
ThingDef.description: Bigger and heavier version of the charge lance wielded by higher class mechanoids. It possess greater damage with incredible armor penetration, along with an added effect of inflicting instant death with a chance of 1%.

ThingDef.label: mech heavy laser blaster
ThingDef.description: A larger version of the mech laser blaster that was used to arm capital-class mech ships, now redesigned to be used by the supreme apocriton.

ThingDef.label: mini-shotgun MK2
ThingDef.description: An upgraded version of the mini shotgun, now with a cylindrical drum which allows the gun to fire 12 rounds of shotgun pellets with a decent stopping power of 250 %.

ThingDef.label: charge battle rifle
ThingDef.description: An advanced charge rifle used by the hydraulic guardians. The charge battle riffle is very efficient in eliminating threats due to its consistent shots and high base damage, and the gun is very accurate due to its reinforced charge barrel and a built-in smart targeting system.

ThingDef.label: mech assault rifle mk.1
ThingDef.description: Widely used assault rifle outfitted for the use of mass-produced expendable mechs. Fairly cheap and easy to manufacture, and boasts a decent stats which rivals modern day rifles.

ThingDef.label: mech assault rifle mk.2
ThingDef.description: An upgraded version of the mech assault rifle mk.1, which uses flash bullets that stuns the target for a 5 % chance.

ThingDef.label: mech assault rifle mk.3
ThingDef.description: An advanced assault rifle used by the militor MK2, now with an ability to inflict frostbite to organic enemies.

ThingDef.label: mech orbital beam targeter
ThingDef.description: A large mech orbital targeter that summons an orbital laser from the heavens. Very effective againsts oraganic targets, but not so effective against other mechanoids.

ThingDef.label: militor assault rifle
ThingDef.description: An assault rifle which was reversed engineered from the original mech assault rifle. The militor assault rifle in an automatic firearm that fires 25 shots and deals more damage than the original.

ThingDef.label: militor assault charger
ThingDef.description: A reversed engineered mech assault charger, which fires pulse bullets that can inflict physical, flame, and EMP damage.

ThingDef.label: militor heavy bolter
ThingDef.description: A reversed engineered and modified charged battle rifle which was designed to be wielded by a militor. The militor heavy bolter can fire high explosive bolts that deals heavy amounts of damage, although its explosion radius is only limited to 1, It's still very effective against singular armored enemies that are clustered together.

ThingDef.label: militor anti material rifle
ThingDef.description: A customized anti-material rifle for militors, which boasts the best long range damage and can inflict EMP damage upon impact.

ThingDef.label: militor scoped SMG
ThingDef.description: A scoped smg made specifically for militors. Like the burst smg, it can fire a hailstorm of bullets and excells greatly at slowing down a singular enemy due to its increadible stopping power.

ThingDef.label: mech gamma laser blaster
ThingDef.description: Tools of infernal chaos wielded by the alpha tesserons. Capable of firing beams of scorching heat, this particular laser blaster can inflict severe gamma beam burns that nullifies heat armor and increase flamability of the victim.

ThingDef.label: mech thumper chaingun
ThingDef.description: A chaingun version of the thump cannon, which fires five consecutive shots of thump bombs.
